goals.complete: I tracked the Minotaur Spirit up into the mountains to the north.
I found some miserable Sons of Svanir. Turns out they've been feeding minotaurs to a dragon minion. This has to stop!

goals.active: Eir will know more about the Sons of Svanir.
goals.complete: I interrogated one of the Sons of Svanir and discovered their ultimate goal is to capture the Spirit of Minotaur and feed it to their leader's pet dragon minion. To stop them, Eir and I need to find Minotaur first.
